messages.subject: The general audience in general; was Digest Number 1505
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/28/01 2:53:13 PM Mountain Daylight Time, ... Why would there be different advice for an individual than for the general audience? -=-I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/28/01 2:53:13 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
ecsamhill@... writes:


> We may need some kind of "road sign" or flag or punctuation mark that shows
> when the comment changes from advice for one person to philosophy for the
> general audience.
>

Why would there be different advice for an individual than for the general
audience?

-=-I gather that
Sandra's intention is to address the general case, in order to provide
information that is generally helpful to the list as a whole.-=-

Almost always!

Perhaps the flag could be... anything to/from unschooling.com is intended to
be discussion intended for the general audience.

Sandra





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
